knimeNode.name: Sample/Snp (CHROM/POS/REF/ALT)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Gets the number of Samples having a given SNP

fullDescription.intro:
This node gets the number of Samples having a given SNP. It adds an integer column for the number of columns per snp. Rows must be sorted by chom/pos/ref/alt/sample
This node counts the number of times a variant (defined as a genomic position and an alternative allele) was found among all the sequenced samples. Those mutations shared between several unrelated samples, are insightly either a common variation between the sample, or an error in the reference sequence.
